Process Control System

Proccontrol

CARMEN provides a process controll system that observes the running modules and is able to restart module in case they die due to a failure.

Usage: ./proccontrol

Proccontrol_setgroup

Usage: ./proccontrol_setgroup

Proccontrol_setmodule

Usage: ./proccontrol_setmodule

Proccontrol_viewoutput

Usage: ./proccontrol_viewoutput

Watchdog

Usage: ./watchdog
